projectGridLines.title: Product Management Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Product research (Primary and secondary market and user research)Create a thesis on the product concept and analysis and present it to the various stakeholders- Build a business plan and pitch it for internal team to build the proposed product/feature- Incubate a product idea from a concept to a prototype and build a road map to productize it.

Skill sets: Computer programming Skill , Operations Research , Project management , product management techniques,  Market Research
